title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.9.0.5 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2019-1-11 16:40 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft 基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器不兼容，不提供支持。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft 基岩版 1.9 仍未发布，1.9.0.5为其第4个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。


bug修复
修复了29个bug

（此版本没有任何内容更新，仅是修复bug）

Fixed several crashes that occurred during gameplay修复了游玩时可能发生的崩溃问题Dinosaurs are now able to damage players in the Dinosaur Island marketplace map在恐龙岛地图中，恐龙现在可以攻击玩家Fixed texel anti-aliasing so that terrain blocks now have sharper textures修复了纹理抗锯齿，使地形区块现在具有更清晰的纹理材质Archers now raise their arms correctly in the marketplace pack "A Nightmare in Candyworld"在"A Nightmare in Candyworld"地图中，弓箭手会正确的举起手臂Fixed a bug that could result in lost items when crafting from the recipe book with a full inventory (MCPE-39621)修复了满背包情况下，从合成书制作时可能导致物品丢失的bugMarketplace content will now download correctly without getting stuck in the process (MCPE-37467)市场内容现在可以正确下载而不会卡死Signs now show the correct text in the "Infinity Plumber" marketplace map"Infinity Plumber"地图中，告示牌会显示正确的文本Animated textures now loop at the correct speed动画纹理现在以正确的速度循环Pandas now hold food correctly when eating (MCPE-39061)大熊猫现在在吃饭时能正确拿住食物Empty slots are no longer highlighted in the skin picker for packs with less than 6 skins对于少于6个皮肤的皮肤包，皮肤选取器中不再突出显示空槽Players can now join games that have previously had multiplayer turned off玩家现在可以加入以前关闭过多人游戏的游戏Fixed the rabbit model in various packs修复了各种包中的兔子模型Fixed Pigman arm positioning in the Mutant Battle Arena pack修复了“Mutant Battle Arena”混搭包中，猪人手臂固定不动的问题Fixed a crash that could occur when loading in resource packs修复了在资源包中加载时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when created a new world with the Halloween Town template修复了使用万圣节城镇模板创建新世界时可能发生的崩溃问题The game no longer crashes when hovering over the arrow in the fletching table recipe book (MCPE-39355)当光标停留在制箭台的合成书时，游戏不会再崩溃Blocks and hotbar items no longer have black textures (MCPE-39368)方块和热键栏不会再显示黑色材质Taiga biomes now generate correctly with podzol and other associated blocks (MCPE-39381)针叶林生物群系现在可以使用灰化土和其它方块正确生成Fixed the position of riders on mounts that allow multiple passengers修正了允许多名乘客骑行时，坐骑的位置Sheep and Cats no longer appear black after being spawned with a spawn egg用生物蛋生成后，绵羊和猫不再出现黑色Fixed a crash that could occur after exiting the settings screen修复了退出设置屏幕后可能发生的崩溃问题Strays now have correct arm positioning in the "Relics of the Skies" pack流浪者现在在“Relics of the Skies”包中有正确的手臂位置Shulkers no longer turn black when attacking a player在攻击玩家时，潜影盒不再变黑Strays now have the correct texture layers again (MCPE-38155)流浪者现在再次具有正确的纹理层Horses will spawn as different variants (rather than just one type) when unspecified in the behavior pack在行为包中未指明时，马将生成不同的变体（而不仅仅是一种类型）Rideable entities that use the 'minecraft:explode' component longer crash the game使用'minecraft：explode'组件的可骑乘实体会导致游戏崩溃The vex mob now holds items correctly in the "Stranded in Space" marketplace pack在“Stranded in Space”包中，恼鬼现在会正确地保存物品Skeleton jockeys now sit correctly on spiders and skeleton horses (MCPE-40057)骷髅骑士现在会正确地坐在蜘蛛和骷髅马上Fixed another instance where player could spawn in mid-air in Old world types (MCPE-38374)修复了玩家可以在旧世界类型的半空中产生的另一个实例
